required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of Qishenyiqi Dripping Pills in Healthy Participants
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Dose-Escalation Phase 1 Study to Evaluate the Safety and Tolerability of Continuous Oral Treatment With Qishenyiqi Dripping Pills in Healthy Participants

brief_summary.textblock: This study will evaluate the safety and tolerability of Qishenyiqi Dripping Pills in healthy participants, following oral administration with multiple escalating dose of it.

detailed_description.textblock:
Qishenyiqi dripping pills, which are made of Huangqi, Danshen, Sanqi, active ingredients of Jiangxiang, have the efficacy of beneficial effects of qi and pulse, blood circulation and pain relief.
This study is a randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled, dose-escalation design study, including three cohorts and 36 healthy participants. Within each cohort, participant will receive Qishenyiqi dripping pills at the selected dose level by oral administration three times a day for 28 consecutive days.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.time_frame: From screening (2 weeks in advance) till follow-up visit (up to 1week)
primary_outcome.description: Observe all the adverse events of all participants administrated orally with Qishenyiqi dripping pills.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with abnormal vital signs index (body temperature)
primary_outcome.time_frame: From screening (2 weeks in advance) till the end of trial period (Day 29)
primary_outcome.description: To investigate the safety and tolerability of Qishenyiqi dripping pills following oral administration in healthy participants.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with abnormal vital signs index (pulse rate)
primary_outcome.time_frame: From screening (2 weeks in advance) till the end of trial period (Day 29)
primary_outcome.description: To investigate the safety and tolerability of Qishenyiqi dripping pills following oral administration in healthy participants.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with abnormal vital signs index (respiratory rate)
primary_outcome.time_frame: From screening (2 weeks in advance) till the end of trial period (Day 29)
primary_outcome.description: To investigate the safety and tolerability of Qishenyiqi dripping pills following oral administration in healthy participants.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with abnormal vital signs index (blood pressure)
primary_outcome.time_frame: From screening (2 weeks in advance) till the end of trial period (Day 29)
primary_outcome.description: To investigate the safety and tolerability of Qishenyiqi dripping pills following oral administration in healthy participants.

primary_outcome.time_frame: screening (2 weeks in advance), Day 8, Day 15, Day 22, Day 29
primary_outcome.description: The complete physical examinations will include an assessment of the general appearance, skin, cardiovascular, abdomen, head, and neck, lymph nodes, musculoskeletal and neurological systems.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with abnormal laboratory assessments (blood routine test)
primary_outcome.time_frame: screening (2 weeks in advance), Day 8, Day 15, Day 22, Day 29
primary_outcome.description: To investigate the safety and tolerability of Qishenyiqi dripping pills following oral administration in healthy participants.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with abnormal laboratory assessments (blood biochemical test)
primary_outcome.time_frame: screening (2 weeks in advance), Day 8, Day 15, Day 22, Day 29
primary_outcome.description: To investigate the safety and tolerability of Qishenyiqi dripping pills following oral administration in healthy participants.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with abnormal laboratory assessments (coagulation function test)
primary_outcome.time_frame: screening (2 weeks in advance), Day 8, Day 15, Day 22, Day 29
primary_outcome.description: To investigate the safety and tolerability of Qishenyiqi dripping pills following oral administration in healthy participants.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with abnormal laboratory assessments (urinalysis routine test)
primary_outcome.time_frame: screening (2 weeks in advance), Day 8, Day 15, Day 22, Day 29
primary_outcome.description: To investigate the safety and tolerability of Qishenyiqi dripping pills following oral administration in healthy participants.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with abnormal laboratory assessments (fecal routine test)
primary_outcome.time_frame: screening (2 weeks in advance), Day 8, Day 15, Day 22, Day 29
primary_outcome.description: To investigate the safety and tolerability of Qishenyiqi dripping pills following oral administration in healthy participants.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with abnormal findings in 12-lead safety Electrocardiogram (ECG)
primary_outcome.time_frame: screening (2 weeks in advance), Day 8, Day 15, Day 22, Day 29
primary_outcome.description: To investigate the safety and tolerability of Qishenyiqi dripping pills following oral administration in healthy participants.
